["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"Arch4edu 是面向高校用户推出的非官方软件仓库，
支持 Arch Linux 和 Arch Linux ARM，
主要包含高校用户常用的科研、教学及开发软件。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"使用方法","children":"使用方法"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"导入 GPG key"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"pacman-key --recv-keys 7931B6D628C8D3BA
pacman-key --finger 7931B6D628C8D3BA
pacman-key --lsign-key 7931B6D628C8D3BA"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["在 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/pacman.conf"}]," 文件末尾添加以下内容："]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"[arch4edu]
Server = {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/$arch","codeLanguage":"ini"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["[",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"不推荐"}],"] 不导入 GPG key，并直接在 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/pacman.conf"}]," 文件末尾添加以下内容："]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"[arch4edu]
SigLevel = Never
Server = {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/$arch","codeLanguage":"ini"}]]}]
